title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', and so on.
OB: When opening the 'Open Type' dialog, these obfuscated classes are prominently displayed.
EB: The obfuscated classes should not be displayed in the 'Open Type' dialog.
SR:
Options:
a) Sort the lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
b) Filter out the obfuscated classes completely.
I suggest implementing option a) to address this issue.
